text
skipx
install

url  --mirrorlist "http://mirrors.fedoraproject.org/mirrorlist?repo=fedora-$releasever&arch=$basearch"
repo --name fedora
repo --name updates
repo --name docker --install --baseurl "https://yum.dockerproject.org/repo/main/fedora/$releasever/"

zerombr
bootloader --location=mbr --boot-drive=vda

clearpart --all --initlabel
partition /boot   --type ext4  --onpart=vda1 --size 256  --label boot
partition swap    --type swap  --onpart=vda2 --size 1024 --label swap
partition btrfs.1 --type btrfs --onpart=vda3 --grow      --label system

btrfs none --data single --label system btrfs.1
btrfs /    --subvol --name root system  

network  --bootproto=dhcp --device=ens3 --ipv6=auto --activate
network  --hostname=localhost.localdomain

shutdown
selinux   --permissive
firewall  --enable --ssh
firstboot --disable

#services --enabled haveged, docker

lang en_GB.UTF-8
timezone Europe/London

rootpw --iscrypted $6$oh6Aic$Ep47UfaFUAy785YJs9tire/7p4BrW/Pi4MGfDWdt6XxIpE6evRKzOz7VdQGSm9kfR6IARQNh6xaab1OeVLIfR0

sshkey --username root "ssh-rsa  dmr@roe.ac.uk"
sshkey --username root "ssh-rsa  stv@roe.ac.uk"
sshkey --username root "ssh-rsa  msh@roe.ac.uk"

%packages

# Text editors
sed
vim
nano
gawk

# Archive tools
tar
zip
gzip

# System admin
sudo
htop
pwgen

# Network admin
iputils
net-tools
bind-utils

# Entropy source
haveged

# Docker tools
docker-engine
docker-compose

# Required for selinux-dockersock 
git
checkpolicy
policycoreutils
policycoreutils-python
policycoreutils-python-utils

%end

%pre
%end

%post
%end
